title: Where are my champions rito plz
body:
Sooo I was playing singularity, pretty fun gamemode rito. 

Suddenly felt inspired and decided to jump into a normal game and go thresh top, but after I pressed the play button at the top left corner, I was stuck at singularity mode. I couldn't click 'change gamemode' or 'invite' or 'play game' and the only button available was cancel but it didn't do anything but play a sound effect. 

After I restarted the client, it took 10 times longer to authorise. After I finally logged in, I pressed play, selected normal, the select buttom became unresponsible again. 

After another restart, and another 5 mins authorising, I finally got into the queue. But when the ready check thing popped up, it suddenly disappeared and said 'ready check couldn't display properly' or something. So I queued up again and got into champ select, but I couldn't select any champ at all which resulted in a dodge penalty. (screenshot included)

Riot pls fix this asap I just wasted 1 hour doing nothing but waiting for my client to work and reporting this bug. {{item:3070}} 

[messed up champselect.jpg](https://s9.postimg.org/m1q8n7qa7/Screenshot_6.png)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
